title: Apollo Took Loss on Portion of Wiped Out Asset-Backed Loan
description: Apollo Global Management Inc. took a loss on a portion of a $170 million asset-backed financing for Amazon brand aggregator Perch that was wiped out, a rare stumble for a strategy touted as one of private credit’s safest and most promising.
content: Apollo Global Management Inc. took a loss on a portion of a $170 million asset-backed financing for Amazon brand aggregator Perch that was wiped out, a rare stumble for a strategy touted as one of private credit’s safest and most promising.
